main event: Observers reported seeing an unidentified flying object in the sky near Xenia, Ohio on May 18, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared very bright and was described as round,The object was seen for approximately 5 minutes and 30 seconds,It moved from south to northwest at a high speed and emitted a bright light,The observer provided a description of the object as being about the size of a small airplane,This sighting was recorded as part of the Project Blue Book documentation
sighted object: a bright, round object in the sky
witness description: The witness described the object as emitting a very bright light and moving rapidly across the sky.
